ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] money problem
ygData.msgSnippet: A lot of the people who are low-level and have a lot of money have another character that they played to a high level first, and used that money to outfit
ygData.messageBody:
A lot of the people who are low-level and have a lot of money have another character that they played to a high level first, and used that money to outfit ("twink" or "tweak") their lower-level character.  I would just recommend playing the game, having fun, and letting the money part come eventually.  :)
 
Nymue

----- Original Message -----
From: kwarden@...
Sent: Tuesday, May 22, 2001 1:08 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] money problem

I am still new to EQ I am looking for ways to earn money. I read post
were people half my lvl (Bard lvl 6) have all this $. I am open to
suggestions.
